Electrical Services

Fusestar Electrical offers a full range of services to meet the electrical construction requirements on Commercial and Institutional Buildings.

Electrical Repair

Fusestar Electrical offers a 72 months electrical repairs to our clients on all complete installation done carried out by our experience personnel.

Electrical Security

Fusestar Electrical comply fully with Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) for the security and safety of our clients.

About Us

10 Years of Experience in this Business

FUSESTAR ELECTRICAL has been in business serving our clients for over 10 years. We have provided services to many industries including Oil, Gas, Coal and Uranium. We can provide Power Construction as well as Design and Startup. We pride ourselves in efficient, cost effective service.
